EmailTemplate.subject: All Of Your Friends Are Doing This…
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STOP emailing sellers individual RFQ’s. START searching for real-time price and availability on GoDirect Trade.
STOP waiting for sellers to open their doors every morning. START buying parts online, 24/7.
STOP buying parts only from sellers that you have a relationship with. START saving money and time by accessing a wider seller network across the globe.
92% of consumers purchase products online. Why are you still using emails and phone calls for used aerospace parts? LAUNCH A STOREFRONT <[[http://www.godirecttrade.com/]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=User_Growth]]> (powered by Honeywell)
